channel.title: ProtoScape
channel.description:
[ul][img]http://s1.postimage.org/c7un7nurd/Proto_Scape_Banner_NOCREDS.png[/img]
Lists of stuff I have, listed by priority[list] [li]College[/li] [li]My life (family, the likes)[/li] [li]And finally, this[/li] [/list]
[size=16pt][b]Supporters:[/b][/size] [list] [li](N)eon[/li] [li]`SJ_[/li] [li]Ix Soulcist xI[/li] [li]Wet Dreamss[/li] [li]lostmyphat[/li] [li]AtomicInt_[/li] [li]sinisoul[/li] [li]RiiPiiNFtW[/li] [li]Sheikyy[/li] [li]neroxx[/li] [/list]
[center][img]http://apollo-server.tumblr.com/photo/1280/656823617/1/tumblr_l3e6rtcBdj1qc81qx[/img][/center]
[i]The server base is Apollo. It is quite exceptional and is extremely easy to change revisions. I hope that when I get this server done and I am done with hosting it for a while, that this release will end all 317's loading ###. Albeit, mine is a 317 loading a 377 cache, but nobody really has a 317 cache. :P There is script support for Ruby, and I will most likely implement this script support more into the server after everything is said and done so people can do what Graham imagined; Download scripts from a repository and install into the server. [/i]
[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,526031.msg3830883.html#msg3830883]More info on Apollo.[/url]
[i]The server started with mining, and was completely scripted in Ruby. Everything else you see is a product of Ares, Arrowzftw, Imsuperman05, and me.[/i]
[left][size=18pt][u][b]Media:[/b][/u][/size][/left] [url=http://img64.imageshack.us/img64/7052/herbclean.jpg]Herb Cleaning[/url] [url=http://img804.imageshack.us/img804/4607/bonesw.jpg]Burying Bones[/url] [url=http://img545.imageshack.us/img545/1470/unfpotion.jpg]Unfinished Potions[/url] [url=http://img220.imageshack.us/img220/112/potion.jpg]Finished Potions[/url] [url=http://img10.imageshack.us/img10/144/cookingqk.jpg]Cooking Meats[/url] [url=http://img683.imageshack.us/img683/2580/thieving.jpg]Pickpocketing[/url] [url=http://img829.imageshack.us/img829/2523/combinations.jpg]Combination RuneCrafting[/url] [url=http://img231.imageshack.us/img231/1083/stooores.jpg]Stores[/url] [url=http://img339.imageshack.us/img339/5825/leathercrafting.jpg]Leather Crafting[/url] [url=http://img824.imageshack.us/img824/3043/potions.jpg]Potions[/url] [url=http://img403.imageshack.us/img403/1581/smelting.jpg]Smelting[/url]

item.title: ProtoScape
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Since it’s open source it basically already is a download. As far as hosting who knows. Probably not because I don’t want the workload of running a server. I will host it for bug testing though.

Read full topic

[/quote]Like what?[/quote]My farming had a couple issues that i never was able to fix. Running had some issue as well. Some npcs are bugged as well. i can’t remember much but i know i was always fixing bugs and glitches on that source, but it wasn’t wanderer’s code that i had to fix it was mainly grahams’

item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

[quote=“sinisoul, post:360, topic:410207”]“I’m quitting RSPS” - AJ Fattypants

LIAR, once you start you never leave[/quote]
I did quit. I just had some unfinished business. Tying up loose ends yaknow.

@artem definitely will give it a look and probably rip some content. High proponent of not reinventing the wheel. Most of skills are done and farming is set up decently. Imsuperman05 was writing it and iirc it was coming along ok. I just wish all the skills could be converted to plugins.

Read full topic

item.title: ProtoScape
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

This is being started up again. I hate leaving things unfinished and I left this unfinished because I wanted to work on my life. Well right now all I am doing is waiting for my life to work out so I figured while I wait I will finish what I started. I still have a lot of things to do in my life, but I’m putting this back on my priority.
“Determine never to be idle. No person will have occasion to complain of the want of time, who never lose any. It is wonderful how much may be done, if we are always doing.” - Thomas Jefferson

I’ll start by making this open source
https://github.com/ProtoScape/ProtoScape

That’s an old version, I’m pretty sure. I would appreciate for those of you who don’t have time to help would look through the code and see anything that needs improved. I will start hosting this so bugs can be found as it’s been over a year since I’ve even opened it. I will update the git repository sometime tonight.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:351, topic:410207”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=511493.msg4103377#msg4103377 date=1347744298]

Bump.

There hasn’t been an update for over 4 months…?
[/quote]
He wanted to know if he could work on it with me, and I said sure. I hardly have any free time, so I said I would take him under my wing and help him out with anything, but I won’t actually be programming. Just giving my ideas on how to do things and whatnot. So you can actually expect some updates soon. :)[/quote]

Oh, okay

Good luck.

Read full topic
